alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Lucie and northeastern Martin Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palm City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walton, Stuart, Palm City, Port Salerno, and Jensen Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin
